property.description: If selected code for parameter checking is included in the build.
Select ADC_B module support.
Select Shared ADC support.

constraint.display: Must be greater than 1.
Unique name required for each instance
Requires GPT three phase PWM Driver
When ADC_B module is used, ADC_B supported must be enabled
The number of supported motors must be greater than or equal to the number of motor stacks.
Select only one ADC module.

requires.display: Add GPT three phase PWM driver [Mandatory]

property.description: Module name.

constraint.display: Name must be a valid C symbol

property.description: 120 degree control type
PWM output port UP
PWM output port UN
PWM output port VP
PWM output port VN
PWM output port WP
PWM output port WN
GPT PWM timer frequency

constraint.display: Must be a valid non-negative value.

property.description: GPT PWM carrier period

constraint.display: Must be a valid non-negative value.

property.description: GPT PWM dead time

constraint.display: Must be a valid non-negative value.

property.description: Current range to measure(Maximum input current)

constraint.display: Must be a valid non-negative value.

property.constraint: eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_120_driver.current_range}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

property.description: Voltage range to measure(Maximum input main line voltage)

constraint.display: Must be a valid non-negative value.

property.constraint: eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_120_driver.vdc_range}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

property.description: Resolution of A/D conversion

constraint.display: Must be a valid Resolution of ADC.

property.display: General|Offset of A/D conversion for current
property.description: Offset of A/D conversion for current

constraint.display: Must be a valid non-negative value.

property.display: General|Conversion level of A/D conversion for voltage
property.description: Conversion level of A/D conversion for voltage

constraint.display: Must be a valid non-negative value.

property.constraint: eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_120_driver.ad_voltage_conversion}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

property.description: How many times to measure current offset

constraint.display: Must be a valid non-negative value.

property.description: Input voltage

constraint.display: Must be a valid non-negative value.

property.constraint: eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_120_driver.input_vdc}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

property.description: Select the behavior of the output pin when the timer is stopped.
Select the behavior of the output pin when the timer is stopped.
Select from which module ADC intterupt happens
Maximum duty of PWM

constraint.display: Must be a valid non-negative value.

property.constraint: eval('' + 'var input = "${module.middleware.motor_120_driver.max_duty}";' + 'var regex_float = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?$","i");' + 'var regex_float_with_suffix = RegExp("^([1-9][0-9]*|0)([.]{1}[0-9]+)?F$","i");' + ' ( regex_float.test(input) || regex_float_with_suffix.test(input))')

property.description: A user callback function. If this callback function is provided, it is called at A/D conversion finish interrupt.

constraint.display: Name must be a valid C symbol

property.description: Module name.

constraint.display: Name must be a valid C symbol
